${ModID}:Sharpen.NAME: Honing Strike
${ModID}:Sharpen.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Modify a random Attack in hand: "Add !M! damage"

${ModID}:Fortify.NAME: Fortify
${ModID}:Fortify.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Modify a random Block card in hand: "Add !M! Block"

${ModID}:Winterize.NAME: Winterize
${ModID}:Winterize.DESCRIPTION: Channel 3 Frost. NL ${ModID}:Modify !M! random enemy-targeted cards in your draw pile: "Apply !M! ${ModID}:Frostbite"

${ModID}:Discombobulate.NAME: Discombobulate
${ModID}:Discombobulate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If you have a *Modified card in hand, deals damage twice.

${ModID}:Attach.NAME: Attach
${ModID}:Attach.DESCRIPTION: Choose a non-Power in hand to ${ModID}:Absorb into a discarded card, then ${ModID}:Modify it: "Play the *Absorbed card". NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Absorb. You will choose the discarded card to Modify after.

${ModID}:Improve.NAME: Improve
${ModID}:Improve.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL ${ModID}:Modify a random card in hand: "Draw 1 card" NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Improve.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL ${ModID}:Modify a card in hand: "Draw 1 card" NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Enhance.NAME: Enhance
${ModID}:Enhance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Modify a card in hand: "Gain !M! Block"

${ModID}:Cheapen.NAME: Cheapen
${ModID}:Cheapen.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Modify a random card in your draw pile: "Costs 0" NL ${ModID}:Amplify [E] : Don't Exhaust.
${ModID}:Cheapen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Modify a card in your draw pile: "Costs 0" NL ${ModID}:Amplify [E] : Don't Exhaust.

${ModID}:Expand.NAME: Expand
${ModID}:Expand.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Modify a card in hand: "Costs 1 more [E] ." and "Play again, unmodified." NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Piratify.NAME: Piratify
${ModID}:Piratify.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, ${ModID}:Modify a random card in hand: "Gain a *Cannonball"
${ModID}:Piratify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, ${ModID}:Modify a random card in hand: "Gain a *Cannonball+"
